Articles.Content:
I still want the ability to drag a bar to full/empty for fuel in the VAB/SPH to see the effects of how we set fuel flow. Not to mention to help see COM in any situation in a ship with more than 10 fuel tanks.

If they did multiplayer, just having the ability to join in another person single player game would be nice. Then we can help each other for fun. Doesn't need anything more complicated than that. Make it as fundamental as possible. Add more later as the need is seen. Even just 4 people. And make it so you can completely close it to multiplayer at a whim.

Edited March 13, 2017 by Arugela
@Garrett Kerman, What you described in your original speculation was KSP 2.0!

I ask that any future speculation on 1.3 and beyond is posted in this thread: 

These two threads pretty much do the same thing. Rather than have them merged, I would like this thread to only be about features, while the thread above should be open for all sorts of feature discussion. Still feel free to discuss confirmed features here! 

Thank you guys!

GK

Edited March 13, 2017 by Garrett Kerman
Why u merge my posts?

You can't make a  thread with an OP of speculations where the very subject of confirmed things is speculative and not have speculation. It's unreasonable... It's literally the majority of the subject you came up with. And some of the features are unknown so it's naturally going to bring up speculation. It's part of the base subject. You can't expect otherwise when you have to do so to discuss the subject... Even the "confirmed" things are speculative. If you want that there is literally no subject to discuss..

Edited March 13, 2017 by Arugela

@Arugela I understand that. But that thread I mentioned above has the same purpose, and these two threads would be merged otherwise. I didn't want these two threads to be redundant. It's also nice to have a list of upcoming features, as the wiki's is not up to date and there is not another one on the forums.

GK

Edited March 13, 2017 by Garrett Kerman

Edited March 15, 2017 by Garrett Kerman
@Garrett Kerman Seems like you forgot about the new models for the struts. Both ends could now be moved
Thank you @Atlas2342! Will add now.

perhaps they will add more then just kerbals into the game??

*imagines launching tiny little pet bunnies into space*

Edited March 15, 2017 by nascarlaser1

On 3/13/2017 at 3:57 AM, Arugela said:

I still want the ability to drag a bar to full/empty for fuel in the VAB/SPH to see the effects of how we set fuel flow. Not to mention to help see COM in any situation in a ship with more than 10 fuel tanks.

You sir, are a genius! That's something I've never heard before. I may not be a programmer, but it doesn't sound too hard to implement in stock.

 

On another note, the OP talks about semi-confirmed, confirmed, and might-be-resurrected features. However, since the pre-release is tomorrow, it would be logical for SQUAD to announce these not-quite-confirmed features before the players get their hands on them. So, I think I can conclude either A) We will see an announcement either later today or early tomorrow, or B) the pre-release is just localization, not 1.3.

the Sentenial Telescope will be stock!

what does it look like?

I don't know where your facts are gathered from. But a few of them are wrong. Radial menus are for consoles. Not PCs. And 1.2.9 is a PC pre-release so other talk of consoles here is wrong.

KSpedia layout has not changed.

super secrets and other speculation - thought this was a 'facts' thread. 

Coherent contracts - yes. That's already been stated in KSP Weeklies past.

Thanks, @JPLRepo. I was looking at weeklys past and was trying to gather information from them, so any clarifcation you give me is greatly appreciated.

GK

Edited March 17, 2017 by Garrett Kerman

Exciting announcement! KSP devs have just announced KSP Making History, which is a paid DLC for the main game. It adds many new exciting features to the game, as well as a whole new dimension to gameplay. Below is a summary of the features included

- Historical missions

- Many US and Soviet inspired parts

- Customizble missions

- And more!

I updated the OP, so check there for the full list!

GK

On 1/22/2017 at 9:00 AM, HoloYolo said:

It's probably not even any future if you think about it.

That's what they said about space travel in general. Humans always find a way.

Wow, this sucks. I'm not paying anything for what can already be done with mods.

Good luck making money on that, @SQUAD. You will need it.
I'm buying it! looks awesome!

Not for me, until garbage collection gets sorted/ better optimised, its just gonna be more stutter heaven. (Keeps eye out for unity update) 

good luck tho squaddies
This is by far the worst "confirmed features" thread ever.

Is it me or does the DLC look like a PR rescue attempt? It has a list of things that will be included but no price tag yet. To me it looks something you want to announce after the last flop. I don't even think all the "confirmed" features will make its way into it.

Edited March 19, 2017 by Veeltch

18 hours ago, Hay said:

This is by far the worst "confirmed features" thread ever.

Why? You just saying that does nothing to help me make this better whatsoever. I'm just trying to document the features that were announced in the weekley's and put it together so people can know what's coming in the next update. If there's somthing in particular that makes you dislike this thread, please let me know. I want to improve this thead so that everyone can enjoy it. You just saying "This is by far the worst 'confirmed features' thread ever" doesn't really help me.

GK
